attributes.additional_details: Provide free permits for workers in schools every one is struggling at the moment we don’t need any extra costs.
attributes.background:
I’m a nursery nurse and single parent.East Finchley will become a parking permit area which means I can’t drive to work as there are limited car parking spaces in our school.
Why should I have to pay for a permit when I work at in an East Finchley school?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: https://www.barnet.gov.uk/your-council/council-and-democracy/get-involved-local-democracy/petitions

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to require all local authorities to issue parking permits to school workers, if that's something you'd like to happen.
